member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_IF_ENTRY
member.summary: TheMIB_IPMCAST_IF_ENTRY structure stores information about an IP multicast interface.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_IF_ENTRY.dwTtl
member.summary: The time-to-live value for this interface.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_IF_ENTRY.dwProtocol
member.summary: The multicast routing protocol that owns this interface.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_IF_ENTRY.dwRateLimit
member.summary: The rate limit of this interface.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_IF_ENTRY.ulInMcastOctets
member.summary: The number of octets of multicast data received through this interface.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_IF_ENTRY.ulOutMcastOctets
member.summary: The number of octets of multicast data sent through this interface.
